Author: __blackcoffee
Text: I'm sorry this happened to you. Pasta is a bit scary for me so I always weigh it out when it's dry so I know exactly how much I'll have. I always do 40 grams and add a bunch of vegetables to my sauce to add volume.  Next time, just put the leftover pasta in a tupperware! It's not wasting and you or someone else can have some later. It stays for a few days in the fridge.
